name: Team Builder Showcase
author: Plugin Wale

sections.description:
The perfect solution to effortlessly showcase your team members on your website! This powerful plugin allows you to display your team’s profiles with ease, using attractive grid and slider layouts. With a user-friendly shortcode, highlighting your team has never been simpler. Enhance your website with our Team WordPress Plugin and let your audience get to know your team with ease. It’s super easy to use and makes your team look awesome!

Standard Features

  • Responsive Team Builder Showcase
  • Compatible With Elementor Page Builder
  • Fully Responsive.
  • All Browser support.
  • Bootstrap Based
  • 4 Template Designs
  • Social Icon Setings
  • Columns Settings
  • Custom CSS Style
  • Team Details Color Option
  • Social Color Option
  • Color Unlimited
  • Add and Remove Team Members
  • Team Builder Showcase by Unique Post id
  • Use via short-code.

Demo

Check Free Plugin Demo – Click Here
sections.installation:
Download & Upload:

  1. Download the Team Builder Showcase plugin (.zip file)
  2. In your admin area, go to the Plugins menu and click on Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and choose the team-builder-showcase.zip file and click on Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin and Enjoy!

Manually:

  1. Download and upload the Team Builder Showcase plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is Team Builder Showcase free?

Yes, Team Builder Showcase is a free plugin.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

short_description: The top WordPress Team plugin helps you display profiles of your team members in a grid or slider layout easily by using a simple shortcode.
